title: Google TV for Android getting ‘Highlights’ feed with entertainment news, Material You redesign
content:
Google TV was a big redesign that replaced the Play Movies & TV app on Android, and it’s now adding a “Highlights” tab that serves as “personalized feed of entertainment news” and getting some Material You flourishes.

more…

The post Google TV for Android getting ‘Highlights’ feed with entertainment news, Material You redesign  appeared first on 9to5Google.
